physical_appearance: This is a pair of doorway hangings or todaliyan. They are 'L' shaped, featuring cotton weave, embroidery work, with mirrorwork embellishments. The hangings have a thin orange border. They are decorated with stylized embroidery of figures, animals foliage, and deities. The figures are bordered by a scrolling geometric pattern.
subject_terms_1: embroidery (visual works) foliage (motif) deities depictions (visual works) birds (motifs) geometric motifs beadwork (visual works)
